author: Staff Reporter
text:
A private job mela will be conducted at 10 a.m. on January 9 in Palani Municipal Boys Higher Secondary School. Private companies would recruit personnel in the mela, said Collector T.N. Hariharan.

In a press release issued here on Thursday, he said the candidates in the age group of 18 and 35 years could take part in the drive.

Minimum qualification was a pass in fifth class, he added.
title: TAMIL NADU
